subject: Cybersecurity
title: How Tor Creates the Dark Web
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: How Tor Creates the Dark Web.

hook.text: Dark websites have addresses ending in .onion and can only be reached through the Tor network.

buildup.text: Tor hidden services host websites that exist only within the Tor network. Neither the server nor visitor knows.

twist.text: Many dark web sites go offline without warning. Addresses change constantly. Even finding a site requires.

punchline.text: A website where no one knows who's hosting it or who's visiting.
